name: Easy Blini (Russian Pancake)
author: Happykat
summary: I love these bite-sized pancakes because they make perfect appetizers. Top blini with smoked salmon, creme fraiche, or even caviar. Add a sprig of dill and they are sure to impress. My children also love eating these plain too!
directions: Combine flour, salt, and baking powder in a bowl
Whisk 3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons milk, egg, and 1 tablespoon melted butter together in a separate bowl
Mix into the flour mixture until batter is fully combined
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet over medium-low heat
Drop batter, 1 tablespoon at a time, onto the heated skillet
Cook until bubbles form, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes
Flip and continue cooking until brown, about 1 minute more
Lay on plate lined with a paper towel to help soak up excess butter
